overview: Let the Adventures Begin... Mateo and his lover, Marcello, are kidnapped by his father's archenemy. The father gets Rod Wolfe, Gun For Hire, to get them back. He catches two of the BAD BOYS taking a break from RAW-DRILLING each other's ASSHOLES. After they finish he ties them up and forces them to say where they're holding Mateo and his lover. With each shot from his UNCUT COCK, Wolfe gets closer to finding the captive young men. This Action-Adventure will make your COCK STAND-UP and SHOOT with or without any ropes! Once Mateo and Marcello are rescued, they have their own ideas as how to express thanks to their hero, Rod Wolfe!
title: Bare Ass Bandidos
